alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:55AM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and Flat Tops. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late this evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
